name: L U M b A
description:
TENSE

VIOLENT

QUICK

L U M b A is a top-down shooter, where you have one mission: Cleanse this earth. It is infected, you have to save it. Fight against hordes of grotesque hellspawn in a desperate fight to save this planet from its destined downfall.

Pal will guide you through many locations, and you will follow his orders.

Always.
